continues.post_str: The undersigned is directed to pay that Shri has taken over charge of the Ministry of Commerce & Industry from Shri with effect from the afternoon of the 28th March 1968 and Shri has taken over charge of the Ministry of Transport & Communications from with effect from the forenoon of the 29th March 1958 will however continue to hold charge of the Ministry of Irrigation & Power until Shri assumed office
